apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji beautifully illustrates a couple united by a heart, with one person in a medium-light skin tone and the other in a medium-dark skin tone, symbolizing diversity and inclusive love. The heart nestled between them radiates with the characteristic Apple glossiness, its smooth gradients and soft highlights conveying a profound emotional bond.  Their gentle posture and the overall warm aesthetic on Apple devices make this emoji a powerful expression of romantic connection across different backgrounds.
